description: This file defines a Kotlin class `MenuItemAdapter` used in an Android application to display menu items in a list. It manages view holders for menu item UI components, handles item interactions such as adding to cart, favoriting, and opening reviews, and implements DiffUtil for efficient list updates.

classes.name: MenuItemAdapter
classes.description: An adapter class for RecyclerView to display a list of menu items with interaction callbacks.

classes.name: MenuItemAdapter.VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class holding references to UI components of a menu item row.

classes.name: Diff
classes.description: DiffUtil.ItemCallback implementation for efficiently updating the list of MenuItem objects.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the layout for a menu item and creates a ViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data from a MenuItem to the UI components of a ViewHolder and sets up interaction handlers.
